attributes.value: Vice President of the Korean Painting Department of the Korea Art Association
Expressing Longing Through Traditional Korean Artifacts
Mixed media (acrylic paint, watercolor paint, and other
12.9 inches wide (W), 9.4 inches high (H), and 0.1 inches deep (D)

metadata.description: Things that have disappeared and can not be seen now, but the bamboo cups and pottery jars that are representative of Korean beauty express the artist's longing. Like the flower language of the white lotus, which symbolizes purity and innocence, the artist wishes to convey nostalgia for a world where everyone lived purely, hoping that their heart will bloom like a lotus.
metadata.name: 그리움 하나 (Yearning One)
